attributes.action: No migrants to be permitted access to the UK
attributes.additional_details: Please take a look at any number of news casts, papers, Internet stories, news broadcasts from around the world. Riots are already happening with people in danger and being hurt. Germans have had to place warnings in school uniforms and a no skirt ban to ensure the safety of the students so they are not "attached and raped" for wearing such items! We DO NOT want or should allow this in the UK!
attributes.background:
The people of the UK need to be put first.
We cannot risk these migrants causing a civil war and civil unrest in an already volatile situation. We certainly cannot afford to house clothe & feed more people We've a housing shortage in the UK Private has already become impossible for people to afford

rejection.details:
Duplicate petition

We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/107142

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
